content: GF#15514 appears to have some illegal interpretations of v3 participation modes in it. I think that that the value set should be ... no, I don't know what it should be. The code system is pretty crap...what should we do?
I think the intention had been for us to submit a harmonization proposal, though we've sort of missed the boat on that...
Create the extension as CodeableConcept and leave it unbound or defer applying the change are the only real options
or we can just bind it to the whole code system for now
